verses.name: Genesis 1:10
verses.text: And God called the dry land Earth; and the gathering together of the waters called he Seas: and God saw that it was good.

verses.name: Genesis 1:11
verses.text: And God said, Let the earth bring forth grass, the herb yielding seed, and the fruit tree yielding fruit after his kind, whose seed is in itself, upon the earth: and it was so.

verses.name: Genesis 1:12
verses.text: And the earth brought forth grass, and herb yielding seed after his kind, and the tree yielding fruit, whose seed was in itself, after his kind: and God saw that it was good.
